mapper.select: select a.* from (tpm_project)a,(select * from tpm_project_member where member_idx=#{member_idx})b where a.project_idx=b.project_idx
select * from tpm_project order by project_idx desc

select p.project_name,p.project_content,p.project_state,c.*,co.* from (tpm_project)p left outer join ( select c.*,w.work_idx,w.work_title,w.work_start,w.work_end,w.work_complete, w.work_confirm,w.work_state,w.checklist_idx,w.checklist_content,w.checklist_state from (tpm_category)c left outer join ( select w.*,ch.checklist_idx,ch.checklist_content,ch.checklist_state from (tpm_work)w left outer join (tpm_checklist)ch on w.work_idx=ch.work_idx)w on c.category_idx=w.category_idx)c on p.project_idx=c.project_idx,
(select count(distinct c.category_idx)as category_num, count(distinct w.work_idx)as work_num, count(distinct w.checklist_idx)as checklist_num from (tpm_category)c left outer join ( select w.*,ch.checklist_idx,ch.checklist_content,ch.checklist_state from (tpm_work)w left outer join (tpm_checklist)ch on w.work_idx=ch.work_idx)w on c.category_idx=w.category_idx where c.project_idx=#{project_idx} )co
where p.project_idx=#{project_idx} order by c.category_idx,c.work_idx,c.checklist_idx

select m.* from ( select w.work_idx from (tpm_category)c,(tpm_work)w where c.category_idx=w.category_idx and c.project_idx=#{project_idx})w, ( select wm.work_idx,m.* from (tpm_work_member)wm,(tpm_member )m where wm.member_idx=m.member_idx order by work_idx)m where w.work_idx=m.work_idx
